epic.title: Payment Integration
epic.description: Implement secure and seamless payment methods into the E-Commerce Platform, starting with UPI to enable instant bank-to-bank transfers for users.

stories.title: UPI Payment Integration
stories.description: Integrate Unified Payments Interface (UPI) as a payment option during checkout to enable instant bank-to-bank transfers for users.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select UPI as a payment method at checkout
System supports major UPI apps (e.g., Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm)
Payment confirmation is received within 10 seconds of transaction initiation
Transaction status is updated in the order management system in real-time
Failed transactions trigger appropriate error messages and retry options

tasks.title: Integrate with UPI Payment Gateway API
tasks.description: Set up and configure the UPI gateway API to allow secure and real-time transactions.

tasks.title: Implement UPI option in Checkout UI
tasks.description: Add a UPI payment method selector in the frontend checkout flow with a smooth user experience.

tasks.title: Handle Transaction Success & Failures
tasks.description: Implement backend handling for transaction success, failures, retries, and user feedback messages.

tasks.title: Update Order Management System on Payment Events
tasks.description: Ensure the order management system reflects the correct transaction state in real-time.

tasks.title: Ensure Compliance with NPCI & RBI Regulations
tasks.description: Implement encryption standards, compliance checks, and reporting as per regulatory requirements.
